Definition: Attribute name; the code used to identify this attribute; most often this will be the table or spreadsheet column name
A descriptive name associated with the domain item value; Default is to use the domain item value; rows regarding attributes are 'dataField'
The domain item value; the entry value in the table; rows regarding attributes are 'dataField'
A succinct but comprehensive definition for the attribute or domain item
The datatype or format of the entry values for an attribute; choose from drop down
Indicates whether null values are permitted as the attribute value (yes/no)
A unit-of-measure for the attribute; e.g. 'meters'
The smallest unit increment to which an attribute value is measured
Indicates if the content of the data set is encoded in case-sensitive ASCII (yes/no)
The number of characters in the data field
The code which represents missing data
The minimum range value permissible for this attribute; this may be a numeric or character
The maximum range value permissible for this attribute; this may be a numeric or character
Anything entered here will be excluded from the mdJSON data dictionary
